name: lingible-infrastructure-v2
description: Next-generation AWS CDK infrastructure for Lingible

scripts.clean: rm -rf cdk.out dist artifacts node_modules ../../website/build && find . -name '*.js' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './scripts/*' -delete && find . -name '*.d.ts' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './scripts/*' -delete && find . -name '*.js.map' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './scripts/*' -delete
scripts.presynth: npm run build && npm run build:lambdas && npm run build:website
scripts.prediff: npm run build && npm run build:lambdas && npm run build:website
scripts.predeploy: npm run build && npm run build:lambdas && npm run build:website
